Ethylene Glycol

Basic Information

PubChem CID:174
Formula:C2H6O2
Molecular Weight:62.07 g/mol
Cryoprotectant:Yes
SMILES:C(CO)O

Description

Used in cryopreservation of embryos and tissues.

Visualization

3D molecular visualization will be available soon.

Molecular structure placeholder

Properties

Melting Point:-12.9 °C
Boiling Point:197.3 °C
Density:1.11 g/mL
